info.title: Automatii
info.author: Gabriel Barros
info.details:
Celular Automata Simulation.

Controls:
---------
ROLL WIIMOTE
		roll camera
PITCH WIIMOTE
		zoom (point forward for no zoom.
		down for zoom in.
		up for zoom out)
[-] or [<-]
		Stop camera
[+] or [->]
		Resume camera control
HOME BUTTON
		Return to loader (exit)

--
Gabriel Barros
